s1001: Three. Three Jin extinguished their ruler.
s1006: Two. Extinguished Zheng. Kang Gong twenty years extinguished, no descendants.
s1181: Twenty-three. Met with Zhao at Ping Lu.
s1184: Seven. Met with Wei Wang at Du Ping.
s1185: Sixteen. Met with Qin Xiao Gong at Du Ping. Invaded Song Huang Chi, Song again took it.
s1190: Twenty-four. Met with Wei at Tian at Jiao.
s1193: Eight. Fought with Wei at Yuan Li, beheaded seven thousand, took Shao Liang.
s1194: Seventeen. Fought with Qin at Yuan Li, Qin took our Shao Liang.
s1196: Twenty-one. Wei besieged our Han Dan.
s1203: Eighteen. Han Dan surrendered. Qi defeated us at Gui Ling.
s1204: Six. Attacked Dong Zhou, took Ling Guan, Lin Qiu.
s1208: Twenty-six. Defeated Wei at Gui Ling.
s1211: Ten. Wei Gong Sun Yang became great good maker, attacked An Yi, surrendered it.
s1212: Nineteen. Feudal lords besieged our Xiang Ling. Built long wall, blocked Gu Yang.
s1215: Eighteen. Lu Kang Gong first year
s1220: Eleven. Built Shang Sai city. Wei Yang besieged Gu Yang, surrendered it.
s1223: Twenty-seven. Defeated Wei at Gui Ling.
s1230: Thirteen. Wei Yang moved capital to Xian Yang. Prince Ang attacked Wei.
s1238: Twenty-four. Defeated Wei at Ma Ling.
s1241: Twenty-five. Wei defeated us at Ma Ling.
s1249: Twenty-six. Wei defeated us at Gu River.
s1259: Sixteen. Attacked Wei, took He Yang.
s1271: Seventeen. Wei attacked us, took He Yang.
s1282: Eighteen. Wei attacked us, took Cheng Gao.
s1284: Twenty-eight. Defeated Wei at Chang Ping.
s1289: Nineteen. Wei took our Cheng Gao.
s1291: Twenty-nine. Qin defeated Wei at Chang Ping.
s1292: Twenty. Qin defeated Wei at Hu Yang.
s1296: Thirty. Qin took our Wu Cheng.
s1301: Twenty-one. Qin took our Wu Cheng.
s1302: Thirty-one. Qin defeated us at Hu Yang.
s1307: Thirty-two. Qin took our Tai Yuan.
s1310: Twenty-two. Qin took our Tai Yuan.
s1311: Thirty-three. Qin took our Yang Qu.
s1316: Thirty-four. Qin took our Shang Dang.
s1319: Twenty-three. Qin took our Shang Dang.
s1320: Thirty-five. Qin took our Han Zhong.
s1325: Thirty-six. Qin took our Sui Zhong.
s1328: Twenty-four. Qin took our Sui Zhong.
s1329: Thirty-seven. Qin took our Yan, Ying.
s1332: Thirty-eight. Qin took our Ju You.
s1337: Twenty-five. Qin took our Ju You.
